earlyJourney: I got into tech out of curiosity about how apps and websites actually work. I was always more interested in building than just studying theory.
learningPhase: I started with frontend and learned React during my internship at Scontinent Technologies, which gave me confidence in real-world development.
growthPhase: At Bizpel, I moved into full stack work, handling both frontend and backend and understanding how complete systems are built.
projectMindset: I like working on projects that solve real problems. HiveFund reflects my interest in trust, fairness, and intelligent systems.
currentFocus: I am currently improving my full stack skills, learning more about AI/ML, and building projects with real impact.
